value.title: Power BI: Hiding future dates for calculations in DAX
value.excerpt: Marco Russo joins Patrick to discuss how to hide future dates for calculations in DAX. Marco walks through Power BI Desktop with some examples that work and don't work.  Hiding future dates for calculations in DAX https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/hiding-future-dates-for-calculations-in-dax/  ******** LET'S

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. Then you can update those Power BI parameters once the report is published to the Power BI service.  PowerShell Samples:

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: How to Sign up
value.excerpt: Do you want to get started using Power BI? After getting Power BI Desktop, you will want to sign up for the Power BI service. In this video, we show you how to do just that! The process is pretty straightforward using your corporate email address. We do call out one gotcha in the even that your admins

value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names!   Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-report-url-filter-improvements/

value.title: RLS with TWO Fact tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you struggled with using Row-Level Security (RLS) on a dimension connected to two fact tables? value.title: The BANANAS approach to use Power BI Bookmarks to swap tooltips

value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative

value.title: What are Power BI data connectors and why should you care?

value.title: Aggregated Table in Power BI with Extra Options   Summarize Function in DAX
value.excerpt: In the previous video, I explained how you can use GROUPBY function in DAX to create an aggregated table. In this video, I'll explain how you can use Summarize function for the same purpose. Summarize function gives you more control on how to create your aggregated table with some extra functions. Let's
